channel.title: Kubernetes on Hello World
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Hello World

item.title: Create Kubernetes Cluster
item.description: What will you get after completing steps below Screenshot of cluster’s dashboard Prerequisites You have a Linux machine in place. Physical or virtual machine doesn’t mather. The Linux OS is supposed to be one of folllowing distroes: the Ubuntu 16+, 18+ or CentOS 7. Internet is available on your machine Caveat Use Virtual Machine to test it before runing it on physical machine VirtualBox or VMWare is a good option.
